encounters.name: Sneaky Goblin Scout
encounters.description: A grotesque goblin with yellow eyes and jagged teeth, clutching a rusty dagger

contents.name: Potion of Minor Healing
contents.description: A shimmering red potion that restores 2d4+2 HP

contents.name: Gold Coins
contents.description: Gleaming gold pieces stamped with an ancient dragon symbol

lore: The walls are carved with ancient runes that pulse with a faint blue glow
You hear the distant echo of dripping water somewhere in the darkness
The air smells of damp stone and something... otherworldly
events: Turn 1: The Dungeon Master conjures a dramatic opening - A goblin appears in the northern chamber!
